name: DRIFT - Escape Police Chase
description:
A Police car chase game which you can Race and Drift your car to Escape the police chase and Drift the car to avoid the obstacles and make the police cars to collide with each other and blow them up the cop cars will follow you escape them in the map and make them collide with the Obstacles and destroy them and Beat your Best score Collect cash to Buy new cars with more Speed and power and You can Upgrade your cars to the Full Powers

How To Play

there are three type of Game play controller you can Choose

1. Steering : steer the wheel left and right to move the car

2. Gyroscope : Rotate your phone left or right to move the car

3. Tap : Tap the left or right screen of phone to move the car to the desired location

FEATURES

* 3 Controllers

* 11 Car Unlockable vehicle

* Collect Cash

* Collect repair

* Open world style

* Buy cars

* Upgrade Your Cars

* All vehicle are different in style , speed and performance

* Change the color of your cars

* Destroy Police cars and make Your Score High
